transcript:
Customer: The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir, abhi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Ji. Main bol rahi hu sir. Abhi kya bataya aapne? Hafte ki kitni lead milengi?
Customer: Hafte ki 17 lead hai sir hamari matlab din ki aap na do ya teen se zyada lead mat consume kariye. Agar hum ek din mein panch panch che che lead le lenge na to hamara balance khatam ho jayega fir lead ka. Jaise abhi hamara jo weekly ka balance hai wo khatam ho chuka hai 10 lead wala. Ab hamare paas Saturday tak daily ki ek ek lead rahegi bas. Hum din ki ek ek lead consume kar payenge. Ek lead ke baad mein wo aapko 399 ki lead purchase karne ka option aayega.
Customer: Samajh nahi aayi baat.
Executive: Mera kehne ka matlab ye hai sir ki hafte ki hamare paas 17 lead hai. Theek hai? Hafte ki 17 ka matlab hai har din har din ki do se teen lijiye.
Customer: Hmm. Bataiye hafte ki 17 means ke do teen do ya teen aapko keh rahe ki roz ki hum inquiry aa rahi hai roz ki.
Executive: Inquiry nahi sir, inquiry alag cheez hai. Inquiry to do form mein aa sakti hai. Koi ya to customer message kar sakta hai ya call kar sakta hai. Inquiry alag cheez ho gayi. Buylead wo hai jisme aap contact by now pe click karke consume karte hain.
Customer: Achha nahi nahi.
Executive: Buylead aapki wo ho gayi sir. Consume karte hain na contact by now pe click karke. Wo hai aapka buylead. Wo aap din ki do lijiye ya maximum teen lijiye. Teen se zyada mat lijiyega otherwise aapka fir weekly ka balance khatam ho jayega jaldi.
Customer: To madam mujhe bataiye. Hmm. Wo jo hum search karte hain ya inquiry pehle aati thi ki message aata tha ki ye banda kuch search kar raha hai to message aata tha. Hmm. To wo kya usse usse bhi sir ab buylead balance lagta hai. Jo catalog view ki aap baat kar rahe hain na us wo bhi agar aapko detail nikalni hai uske liye bhi ek buylead balance lagta hai ab aapka.
Customer: Madam ye jo pehle humne payment ki hai 32000 34 ya 36 jo bhi hai wo kis cheez ki hai? Pehle to humne kuch bataya nahi ye extra ab le loge payment.
Executive: Ye to sir bahut time se catalog view wali cheez to bahut time se buylead mein convert ho chuka hai ki uske liye ek buylead balance lagta hai hamara.
Customer: To madam buylead balance to alag cheez hogi na jab humne ek bar ek saal ka subscription le liya aapse one year ka to usme aap extra niche jod rahe ho ye wale buylead alag se ho gaye ye wale alag se ho gaye to ye to fir aap ja ke 60000 pe pahunchoge mahine mahine saal mein.
Executive: Kyun sir aisa nahi hai. Ab jaise maan lijiye koi customer aapko call kar raha hai hum usme to aapka buylead balance nahi laga rahe na ki aapko number nahi denge jo call kar raha hai ya jo inquiry kar raha hai.
Customer: Madam inquiry kar raha tha to hume pehle message aata tha ki ye banda inquiry kar raha tha jab humne nahi liya tha. Ab humne isko le liya hai uske baad wo usse kam aane shuru ho gaye hain.
Executive: Achha pehle se zyada? Haan inquiry kam aa rahi hai aap keh rahe hain pehle se zyada.
Customer: Haan pehle se pehle to jab humne nahi liya hua tha aapka ye plan to usse usse to koi na koi hume search karta rehta tha tab to zyada aate the. Jab se plan liya tab se to aap usme ek road to do buylead se to aise hi bande phone kar dete hain hume hum apne social media se kar dete hain. Aapne to Jammu Kashmir dal rakha hai. To all India market lene ka hume kya benefit hua fir? All India to giregi nahi.
Executive: Ye cheez to sir aapko explain ki gayi hogi na ki kitni buylead milengi aapko hafte mein.
Customer: Madam ye koi nahi kiya hoga kitni milengi tab to hazaron sahab se bata rahe the ki roz kitni aayengi hum 300 se 400 aapko denge ye denge wo denge. Ab to aap do pe aa gaye ho roz ke do ke roz ke to hazaron ke customer to aise hi aa jate hain do ke liye humne kis liye paise karne hain?
Executive: Sir buylead dekhiye inquiry call pe sir koi cap nahi hai ki matlab inquiry aapke paas kitni bhi aa sakti hai call bhi aapke paas kitni bhi aa sakti hai jitna customer aapko search kare but buylead.
Customer: Madam inquiry kahan se aayegi wo kahan se show karegi inquiry aayi hui hai kahan milegi wo?
Executive: Lead manager se hi milegi aapko.
Customer: Achha lead manager se wo kahan kahan se hai inquiry uski kahan se show hoga?
Executive: Aap kis mein gaye ho lead manager se?
Customer: Achha ji sir. Haan to main aapko wahi bol rahi hu inquiry pe koi count nahi hai jo customer aapko samne se message bhej sakta hai us cheez pe koi limit nahi hai wo kitne bhi bhej sakte hain call kitne bhi aa sakte hain bas jo buylead aap requirement matlab customer ki jo purchase kar sakte hain consume kar sakte hain us pe limit hai hafte ki 17 ki. Aur wo bhi limit nahi hai sir IndiaMART pe alag alag packages hai. Aapko lead zyada chahiye aap service badha ke next level service ka plan karke buylead ka count zyada leads bhi consume kar sakte hain.
Customer: Chalo theek hai madam ek bar main check kar leta hu maine to do din se khola nahi tha ki wo open nahi ho raha tha to abhi inquiry kitni aa rahi hai ek bar baat kar leta hu.
Executive: Haan ek bar aap baat kar lijiye sir. Theek hai baki aapka ek concern open ho gaya tha kyunki aapka call miss ho gaya tha Shivam se wo main close kar du?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Theek hai sir koi dikkat rehti hai to aap connect kar sakte hain main apne number se aapko ek message dal deti hu whatsapp pe kuch issue aata hai aapko agar din mein to aaj Shivam available nahi hai aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai madam theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Baki sir feedback bhi aayega aapke paas mein concern main close karungi to waha pe aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know weekly lead limit.

- Inquiries have decreased after subscription.

- Jammu Kashmir is set in profile.



Resolution:

- Explained weekly lead limit is 17.

- Explained difference between inquiry and buylead.

- Explained how to increase lead count.

- Agreed to send a WhatsApp message.

- Offered to connect if any issues arise.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check lead manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, inquiries, lead manager
